PathOfBuilding.Notes:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PXsjimXmFSE&t=372s
https://docs.google.com/document/u/0/d/1NbBbwPDUrtwYryAElxNIHs0chSiRwF5jDIBhf6fZZow/mobilebasic
Perfect Blasphemer = 10-50c Monster Category: Undead Creates moving Cursed Ground Uses Smite = more dmg than generosity wrath Hexes can affect Hexproof Enemies
Perfect Spirit of Fortune = 60c-2d Monster Category: Construct Casts Shock Nova Casts Spark Casts Lightning Warp Casts Wrath Lightning Damage of nearby allies is Lucky
Perfect Forest Warrior = 20-100c Monster Category: Humanoid Cyclones Uses Molten Fissure Culling Strike Nearby allies have Onslaught
Perfect Warlord = 4-7d Monster Category: Humanoid Uses Leap Slam Uses Sweep Uses Enduring Cry ! Uses Immortal call Casts Vitality = 50/s Shares Endurance Charges with allies !

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
-AG- - Leercast - Minions deal 50% increased Damage
- Dyingbreath - Nearby Allies deal 18% increased Damage 18% increased Curse Effect
